abstract: Citigroup shareholders approved an increase in its authorized shares, allowing the bank to complete an exchange offer that will make the United States government into Citi’s one-third owner on Sept. 10.
snippet: Citigroup shareholders approved an increase in its authorized shares, allowing the bank to complete an exchange offer that will make the United States government into Citi’s one-third owner on Sept. 10.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said Thursday that its shareholders approved an increase in its authorized shares, removing the last hurdle to an exchange offer that will make the United States government into Citi’s one-third owner.

headline.main: U.S. to Take One-Third Citi Stake Next Week
